name: Interweb Peeragogy Dashboard
tagline: “The more you inspire, the more people will inspire you.” ~Simon Sinek
body:
![alt text](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3668236/8311012/c1e3dfd8-19d3-11e5-9c7e-81c7c1c5033d.jpg)

## The Templates

Ready to use or create a new page templateone or customize you own layouts? Here's how to get started.

1. In the sidebar, is a *Download Zip* link. Click it to download.
2. Open the folder directly on your desktop and launch the index.html file in your browser.
 
And Voilà!! Erything you need on a single page.


## Integrations


 Pull from `upstream` frequently to keep your local copy up to date:
 
 ```
 $ git pull upstream gh-pages
 ```

If you want to be a developer with all additions and fork this repository
```
 $ git clone https://github.com/FTG-003/Peeragogy-Dashboard.git
 $ cd dashboards

 ```
## Contributing

Contributions are 11,000,000% welcome! That's a lot!
Please file issues for any bugs you find or features you'd like to see. And if you're up for it, send in a pull request.

## Support
 
Need a hand with something? Send us an email to [contact@FTG-003.io](mailto:contact@FTG-003) and I'll get back to you right away!
 For technical questions, use the [`FTG-003-io`](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/FTG-003) tag on Stack Overflow.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
